Class MarshallerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beanio.internal.parser.MarshallerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Debuggable, Marshaller

    public class MarshallerImpl
extends Object
implements Marshaller
    Default Marshaller implementation.

    2.0
